title: When someone tries to insults you, but they misspell every word.

replies.body:
Happened last game

"mep awernas" made me spill my drink
sounds like they tried to spell Meep Awareness.

{{champion:432}} Meep? Where!?

*"An ally has been slain"*

{{champion:432}} Oh.
My thoughts exactly :3
Picked up a meep? Worth.
Wait you can talk?
*{honk}*
Bwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhh...
Thats more like it

I'm surprised no one has pointed out that meeps spawn on him.
He collects chimes. XD
always love when people call me "retarted"
Oh man... that sounds tasty...
Don't lie, we all know you're a re-fried pop tart

are you making and selling these. 
I will buy
Onley too peepl dat arntt grramner natzees
what a ratard
Stop spamming the boards for f*ck's sake
http://cdn.gifbay.com/2012/11/nothing_stops_this_train-9763.gif
What are ya gonna do about it Big man?
Honestly, the memes are getting very repetitive. Waiting for boards to move out of this phase because it kinda sucks.
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Morgan-Freeman-Saying-Good-Luck-The-Dark-Knight.gif
I'd rather have a fair number of at least largely amusing meme posts then the brain dead NERF X CHAMP 2 OP shit that usually dominates the boards.
#_**Agreed**_
Do something about it b0ss
but... leauge dosn't have speel cheak in gam :<

Happened to me earlier...

some guy that didn't know how to play Xin was all like "Just be quit already"... how can I be quit?
hue
Lo qwality bate tred.
